subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The rule that barred athletes who had served a doping suspension of six months or longer from competing in the next Olympics was struck down as overly severe.
snippet: The rule that barred athletes who had served a doping suspension of six months or longer from competing in the next Olympics was struck down as overly severe.
